mapper.select: SELECT OI_CODE , OI_NM , OI_NICK_NM , OI_TYPE , OI_SORT_ORDR , DEFAULT_AT , USE_AT , OI_PARN_CODE FROM tb_option_item WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' AND OI_CODE = #{optionCode}

SELECT C_CODE AS OI_CODE , C_NAME AS OI_NM , C_PARENT_CODE AS OI_TYPE , C_ORDER AS OI_SORT_ORDR , IF(c_parent_code = '0000000020','N','Y') AS ADD_FLAG , IF(c_parent_code = '0000000020','1','2') AS DEPTH FROM tb_code A WHERE C_IS_DEL = 'N' AND c_parent_code IN('0000000020','0000000032','0000000033') UNION ALL SELECT OI_CODE AS OI_CODE , OI_NM AS OI_NM , OI_TYPE AS OI_TYPE , OI_SORT_ORDR AS OI_SORT_ORDR , IF(OI_TYPE = '0000000034','Y','N') AS ADD_FLAG , '3' AS DEPTH FROM tb_option_item WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' ORDER BY DEPTH, OI_SORT_ORDR

SELECT A.OI_CODE , A.OI_NM , A.OI_TYPE , A.OI_SORT_ORDR , DECODE(LEVEL,'2','Y',DECODE(OI_TYPE,'0000000034','Y','N')) AS ADD_FLAG , LEVEL DEPTH FROM (SELECT C_CODE AS OI_CODE , C_NAME AS OI_NM , C_PARENT_CODE AS OI_TYPE , C_ORDER AS OI_SORT_ORDR FROM tb_code A WHERE C_IS_DEL = 'N' UNION ALL SELECT OI_CODE AS OI_CODE , OI_NM AS OI_NM , OI_TYPE AS OI_TYPE , OI_SORT_ORDR AS OI_SORT_ORDR FROM tb_option_item WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N' ) A START WITH OI_TYPE ='0000000020' CONNECT BY PRIOR OI_CODE = OI_TYPE ORDER SIBLINGS BY OI_SORT_ORDR NULLS FIRST, OI_SORT_ORDR, OI_NM
SELECT oi_code , oi_nm , oi_nick_nm , oi_type , oi_sort_ordr , default_at , use_at , oi_parn_code FROM tb_option_item WHERE delete_at = 'N' AND oi_type = #{option_code} ORDER BY OI_SORT_ORDR ASC

SELECT IME_CODE AS CODE , IME_NIKE_NM AS NIKE_NM , IME_NM AS NM , IME_SORT_ORDR AS SORT_ORDR , DEFAULT_AT , USE_AT FROM tb_item_manage_entrps WHERE IME_TYPE = #{option_code} UNION ALL SELECT IMP_CODE AS CODE , IMP_NIKE_NM AS NIKE_NM , IMP_NM AS NM , IMP_SORT_ORDR AS SORT_ORDR , DEFAULT_AT , USE_AT FROM tb_item_manage_prdlst WHERE IMP_TYPE = #{option_code} ORDER BY SORT_ORDR ASC
SELECT om_code FROM tb_orgnzt_manage WHERE om_orgnzt_se ='1' AND use_at = 'Y' AND delete_at = 'N' AND om_sort_ordr > 0
SELECT RIGHT(CONCAT('0000', IFNULL(CAST(MAX(OI_CODE) AS SIGNED), 1)), 5) AS oi_code from tb_option_item

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_BBS_MANAGE WHERE DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND BM_SJ LIKE '%${params.word}%'
AND BM_CN LIKE '%${params.word}%'

${pagingStart} SELECT BM_INNB , BM_SJ , E.EM_NM REGIST_MAN , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_ATTACH_ITEM WHERE AI_NO = B.ATCHMNFL_INNB AND DELETE_AT = 'N') AI_CNT , date_format(B.REGIST_DE,'Y%-m%-d%') REGIST_DE FROM TB_BBS_MANAGE B LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMPL_MANAGE E ON B.REGIST_MAN = E.EM_NO WHERE B.DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND BM_SJ LIKE '%${params.word}%'
AND BM_CN LIKE '%${params.word}%'
ORDER BY B.REGIST_DE DESC ${pagingEnd}

SELECT BM_INNB , BM_SJ , BM_CN , E.EM_NM REGIST_MAN , date_format(B.REGIST_DE,'Y%-m%-d%') REGIST_DE , B.ATCHMNFL_INNB AM_NO FROM TB_BBS_MANAGE B LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMPL_MANAGE E ON B.REGIST_MAN = E.EM_NO WHERE BM_INNB = #{bmInnb}

SELECT OM_CODE AS KEY , OM_NM AS VALUE FROM TB_ORGNZT_MANAGE WHERE CASE WHEN OM_NM < 'ㄱ' THEN UPPER(SUBSTR(OM_NM, 1, 1)) WHEN ASCII('ㄱ') <= ASCII(OM_NM) AND ASCII(OM_NM) <= ASCII('ㅎ') THEN OM_NM WHEN OM_NM < '나' then 'ㄱ' WHEN OM_NM < '다' then 'ㄴ' WHEN OM_NM < '라' then 'ㄷ' WHEN OM_NM < '마' then 'ㄹ' WHEN OM_NM < '바' then 'ㅁ' WHEN OM_NM < '사' then 'ㅂ' WHEN OM_NM < '아' then 'ㅅ' WHEN OM_NM < '자' then 'ㅇ' WHEN OM_NM < '차' then 'ㅈ' WHEN OM_NM < '카' then 'ㅊ' WHEN OM_NM < '타' then 'ㅋ' WHEN OM_NM < '파' then 'ㅌ' WHEN OM_NM < '하' then 'ㅍ' ELSE 'ㅎ' END = UPPER(#{keyword}) OR( OM_NM LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND DELETE_AT = 'N' AND OM_ORGNZT_SE = 2
SELECT C.OM_CODE AS KEY , O.OM_NM AS VALUE FROM TB_CMMNC_BHF C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORGNZT_MANAGE O ON C.OM_CODE = O.OM_CODE WHERE CM_INNB = #{cm_innb} AND C.DELETE_AT = 'N'
SELECT C.SM_CODE AS KEY , O.OM_NM AS VALUE FROM TB_CMMNC_STR C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ORGNZT_MANAGE O ON C.SM_CODE = O.OM_CODE WHERE CM_INNB = #{cm_innb} AND C.DELETE_AT = 'N'
